Creon<tm tmtype="reg"/> Micro Indications and dose

Pancreatic insufficiency

By mouth

  • Child

    Initially 100 mg, to be taken before each feed or meal; granules can be mixed with a small amount of milk or soft food and administered immediately (manufacturer recommends mixing with acidic liquid or pureed fruit before administration), granules should not be chewed before swallowing.

  • Adult

    Initially 100 mg, to be taken before each feed or meal; granules can be mixed with a small amount of milk or soft food and administered immediately (manufacturer recommends mixing with acidic liquid or pureed fruit before administration), granules should not be chewed before swallowing.

Dose equivalence and conversion

100 mg granules = one measured scoopful (scoop supplied with product).
